content: the spring spirals beanie was inspired by the lovely colors of malabrigo yarn in my search for stitches that show off such beautiful yarn i realized a simple single_crochet in the back loop does wonders this pattern is quite simple as it is the same stitch repeated in rounds it is great for beginners you will find the baby/child version of this hat here baby spirals beanie 1 stitches used slip_stitch single_crochet in the back loop only **edited on february 19 2013 for sizing ** **this pattern was tested for clarity fit and errors on the free pattern testers 2 board in october of 2012 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/baby-spirals-beanie 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/free-pattern-testers
